nodes.value: Giving special attention to one particular task or project.
I am focusing on completing this document before lunch.
Hoy, me estoy centrando en la refactorización de código.
Today, I’m focusing on code refactoring.
The action you plan to take immediately after finishing a current task.
My next step is to prepare the final report.
Mi próximo paso es integrar la nueva API.
My next step is to integrate the new API.
